pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:6.1: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:7.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:7.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:8.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:8.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:8.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.2: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.3: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.6: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.7: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:9.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:11.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
